alert.note: Alert for San Miguel; Santa Fe (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 6:44PM MDT until June 06 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico... East central Santa Fe County in north central New Mexico... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 644 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Rowe to near Ribera, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pecos, Upper Colonias, Villanueva, Glorieta, Villanueva State Park, Ribera, Rowe, South San Ysidro, Sena and Lower Colonias. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 298 and 316. State Road 63 between Mile Markers 0 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
